snippet.title: Bath Time Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now for iOS (https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/bath-time-by-cocoa-moss/id1427147878) and Android (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cocoamoss.bathtime).
Or play it online at http://cocoamoss.com/bath-time/bath-time.html
=====
The meomwies are lining up for bath time. Wash them quickly, or you’ll run out of space!

- Swirl the dirty meowmies in water to clean them.
- Tap clean meowmies to hang dry.
- Tap or swipe dry meowmies to put them away.
- Some meowmies might be extra dirty or a bit offensive in odor. No need to panic – tap the soap button to add soap!

Bath Time was developed by DDRKirby(ISQ) and Kat Jia, under the Cocoa Moss label. It was originally developed in 72 hours as an entry for round 42 of the Ludum Dare game jam.

Soundtrack download: https://ddrkirbyisq.bandcamp.com/album/bath-time-original-soundtrack
